title: Who sang “How am I Supposed to Live Without You”? - Quora

response.answer_text: Laura Branigan did this song first. Her version made it to #12 on the charts during the fall of 1983. Michael Bolton wrote the song and recorded a version of it in 1989 which became a #1 smash hit beginning on 1/20/1990 for 3 weeks. Sources: Joel Whitburn’s BillboardBook of Top 40 Hits and Fred Bronson’s BillboardBook of the Number One Hits.

Two countries female artist sang the song at the two countries female artist sang the song at the time that debuted promoting the movie Conair with Nicolas Cage the two female recording artist or Trisha Yearwood and Faith Hill this is not a duet but two separate artists recording the Same Song with only the melody and of course the voice differing they sell winning best female recording artist that year that song helping her
